recentChanges:
Features
- Voice Overlay is now available on all Android devices. It was available previously and still is now. Checkmate grammarists.
- Videos can now play **inline** in chat with and has a full screen mode. Jokes about full screens are difficult. I'm a screen half full guy myself.

Bug Fixes
- EVEN MORE keyboard bugs fixed!
- Reconnecting to a voice call should maintain muted state.
- Some rotation crash fixes. You can safely do a barrel roll now.
comments: One of the Best apps for chatting and texting. I got a lot of my old friend together because of discord. The only thing that needs fixing is The Voice Calls, this happens to me sometimes. I will be in a voice chat for a few minutes, or hours. Suddenly, it will stop transmitting my Voice. Other times. It will kick me out of the call completely, but discord is great overran. And it usually is ok with calls!

Oh my god this update is awesome! It even removed the bug for which I put a 2 star rating. I'm really sorry developers I didn't tell you the problem, I didn't see your reply! I kept getting kicked out of Discord after talking to some friends of mine and this happened quite often. But now downloading it after a long time it seems to have been gone! You did a great job, keep it up!! This app will be a huge success :))))

Very convenient for finding large communities around any subject. I love being able to talk with my friends in a small group chat, or in a large server with fun bots. The premium features are certainly worth it for anyone that spends a majority of their time within the app. However, all premium features are a monthly, or yearly payment. This is not very convenient for those who don't have a steady source of income. There should be an option to get minimum parts of premium for a single payment.

Most of the times it doesn't work without headphones, however if I use it in another smartphone it does work. Something that I've experienced is that while you're in a call, it mutes or something like that, so I have to get out of the call and get in again, this "mute" happens while I'm not touching the phone and quitting the call is the only solution i've found

Hello. Whenever I have discord open (browser or app), I completely lag out of games and my discord client, and it causes my web browser to stop responding. Without discord open, I never experience lag. Also, while in both browser or app, I'll suddenly be completely unable to speak in discord, but can hear everything that other people are saying. Has anyone else had this issue? I'm dying for a fix. I love discord, but it's been basically unusable for the last couple weeks.

title: Mad Skills Motocross 2
description:
The best side-scrolling motocross game ever made just got better!

Discover what professional racers, motocross fans, and casual gamers across the globe already know: Mad Skills Motocross 2 is the most intense Android racing experience of all time!

Mad Skills Motocross 2 includes:

UNBELIEVABLE PHYSICS!
Mad Skills Motocross 2 features the best motorcycle physics of any side-scrolling racing game on the planet. You‚Äôll be amazed at the responsiveness of the bikes in this game. The more you play, the faster (and more addicted) you‚Äôll get.

12 DIFFERENT BIKES!
Work your way up through 12 different motorcycles, each with different speeds and handling. Get the fastest bike and dominate your friends!

AN EXCITING NEW PLAYER-VS.-PLAYER ‚ÄúVERSUS‚Äù MODE‚Ä®
This feature is an absolute blast. Choose a friend (or random opponent), pick a track, and lay down the best lap time you can in two minutes. Then see if they can beat it in the same amount of time. Battle to earn XP so you can level up and score awesome virtual goods.

DOZENS OF TRACKS ‚Äì WITH MORE ADDED EVERY WEEK FOR FREE!
Mad Skills Motocross 2 has enough content to keep you busy for years. Beat the stock opponent on dozens of career tracks, and then see if you can beat the Ace to unlock more tracks. Once you‚Äôve Aced them all, take on your friends, neighbors, and players all over the world. You can even follow real-life professional motocross racers ‚Äì almost all of them play Mad Skills ‚Äì and take on their best times.

WEEKLY COMPETITIONS!
Mad Skills Motocross 2 features an online competition called JAM, which pits you against fellow players across the world on new tracks every week. JAM will likely be one of the most addicting experiences you‚Äôve ever had on your mobile device.

CUSTOMIZABLE BIKES AND RIDERS‚Ä®
Change the color of your bike and your rider‚Äôs gear, and add your favorite number to your bike‚Äôs number plate. If you‚Äôre fast enough, you can even earn a virtual Red Bull helmet to let your friends know you rule!

AND MORE!

Optional rockets to help you past difficult levels and competitors

Universal application. Connect with Facebook, Twitter or Google Play and your game progress and purchases will sync between devices.

Beautiful settings that are HD optimized for an amazing gameplay experience.

See the official trailer here: www.madskillsmx.com/trailer

Like Mad Skills Motocross 2 at www.facebook.com/madskillsmotocross
Follow Mad Skills Motocross 2 at www.twitter.com/madskillsmx and www.instagram.com/madskillsmx

IMPORTANT NOTE: While this app is free to download and play, there are some items in the game that cost real money. Also, Mad Skills Motocross 2 links to social networks that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.  This game includes advertising of Turborilla products and products from select partners.

recentChanges:

comments: I need my controls back. This is just getting so annoying. Ever since I made a review I've lost so much control. So f in inconsistent. Just give me control of my bike Presss the gas and no movement. Lean forward and bike keeps going backwards. So sick of spending more time fight useless controls then being competitive. Sick of losing cause I can't control my own bike.
To get bike 6 it takes for eaver if you dont play other people much it's been 3 or 3 days and I'm only at 500 it is taking too long to get another bike please fix this it is annoying

Game works well but maaaaan the mechanics are nonsense. You can't really tell if your driver will lean back or forth and when most importantly and what is happening with lap 2. For some reason when I feel that I have learn a stage well enough in the 2nd lap everything goes crazy, it's like another stage. Also from one bike to the next the performance difference is not that rewarding. I found myself many times to be slower from a #2 bike when I have #3.

Game Is amazing I've earned all the bikes. I've made it to division 1. Physics are awesome. Very realistic. I would give it 5 stars but I think that they should add a track editor to where you could make your own tracks. If it were a option I would give this 10 out of 5 stars. I think turborilla should add in an easy track editor to make your own tracks. I've always wanted that in this game. I think it would also bring more players.
Your update yesterday has wiped out every thing on my tablet and won't even load and i was 75% completed.

title: AT&T Call Protect
description:
Activate the Call Protect app to enable Spam Risk and Unknown Caller blocking and more at no extra charge. Eligible AT&T subscribers are already protected with automatic Fraud call blocking and nuisance call warnings, using the power of the AT&T network. Call Protect subscribers also receive access to AT&T Mobile Security which help protect your phone from malware, viruses and other mobile threats. Req‚Äôs download of separate apps.  

Avail. for AT&T postpaid, FirstNet and business wireless customers with eligible wireless service.  

AT&T Call Protect: 
- Automatic Fraud Blocking: Detects and blocks calls from likely fraudsters, before your phone even rings 
- Block Spam Risk labelled calls: Enable in-app to block or send to voicemail calls identified as Spam Risk 
- Unknown Callers sent to voicemail: Enable in-app to send callers not in your contact list to voicemail. 
- Get a heads up on potential nuisance calls*: See warnings of telemarketers, nonprofit, surveys, account services, private or political callers 
- Personal Block List: Add individual unwanted callers to your own block list 
- Report Spam Calls: Help identify suspected spam and likely fraud calls. Your reports help us to continually improve our service for everyone  

AT&T Call Protect Plus (In-app purchase): 
- Caller ID*: Gives you caller details 
- Custom Call Controls: Take more control by blocking, sending to voicemail or allowing entire Categories (Telemarketer, Account Services, etc.) of callers 
- Reverse Number Lookup: Shows caller details when you enter a U.S. number. Up to 200 queries per user within 24-hour period. 
*Available in AT&T HD Voice coverage areas  

AT&T Mobile Security & Call Protect Terms: 
Automatic Fraud and Spam Risk Blocking: May inadvertently block wanted calls. Nuisance Call warnings: May include service messages and/or other permitted calls. Personal Block List: Permits blocking of individual phone numbers (excludes private numbers). Manage all settings via app.  

AT&T Mobile Security & Call Protect Plus Terms: 
$3.99/mo. Service auto-renews every 30 days unless canceled. Manage mobile purchases at att.com/mobilepurchases or call 800.331.0500 (611 from wireless phone). All Google Play billed subscriptions must be cancelled within Google Play. Deleting the app will not cancel the subscription. Custom Call Controls: All call categories, except Fraud, are automatically set to allow. Manage all settings via app. Payments are nonrefundable (subj. to applicable law).  

Rates: Data charges may apply for app download and usage. Other charges and restr. may apply. Eligibility: Compatible device req‚Äôd and includes AT&T HD Voice-enabled Android smartphones. Smartphones sold by other carriers may not be eligible. Excludes AT&T PREPAID.  

For complete terms for AT&T Call Protect, see att.com/callprotectterms 
For complete terms for AT&T Mobile Security, see att.com/mobilesecurityeula

title: LINE: Free Calls & Messages
description:
LINE reshapes communication around the globe, allowing you to enjoy not only messaging but also free voice and video calls wherever you find yourself. 

Download LINE and discover the reasons for its global popularity and number one ranking in 52 countries.

LINE's latest features

‚òÖ Intimate conversations or large round tables can happen anywhere with group video calls
Chat with up to 200 friends in your group simultaneously! Enjoy face to face video chats with friends as well!

‚òÖ Use polls to quickly see what your friends think
From where to meet to what to eat, avoid lengthy discussions and make decisions easily by creating a poll.

LINE's main features

‚òÖ Free voice and video calls anywhere, anytime 
Enjoy great quality calls at no charge, no matter where you are. Even international calls with up to 200 people at the same time are completely free! Use effects and filters for even more fun during video calls. (Note that this feature may not be available on certain devices.)

‚òÖ Convenient chats where anything is possible 
Share messages, photos, videos, stickers, voice messages, and locations easily with friends. 

‚òÖ Fun and easy-to-use social networking features 
From messages and photos to videos and locations, share your daily moments with friends on Timeline! 

‚òÖ Find the world's most popular characters at the Sticker Shop 
Browse hundreds of popular free stickers plus adorable stickers of the world's favorite characters! Choose from a variety of LINE sticker sets to liven up your messages in your own unique way. 

‚òÖ Auto-sync your device and PC 
Whether on the go with the mobile version or connected to the desktop version using your PC or Mac, your LINE chats are always up-to-date and synced automatically across all versions. 

‚òÖ Your own personal storage space: Keep 
Store messages, photos, videos, and more in Keep where you can easily share them with friends.  

‚òÖ  Stay informed with LINE official accounts
Connect directly with your favorite celebrities and companies by friending their official accounts.

‚òÖ Get connected to new apps
LINE provides a gateway to entertainment and lifestyle apps that will keep you entertained and bring new convenience to your life.

‚òÖ Make international calls with LINE Out
Place international calls to mobile phones and landlines at low rates. You can even call friends who aren't on LINE.
Plus, enjoy free calls after watching ads with LINE Out Free.

‚òÖ Face Play: May the best face win!
Get ready to stretch those facial muscles! Rack up new high scores in solo mode, or battle it out with your friends in duo mode for double the fun. Don't forget to collect your special trophy and skin when you complete a mission or become the season champion!

‚ñ† We recommend using a data plan or connecting to Wi-Fi as you may incur data usage fees otherwise. 
‚ñ† Please also use LINE with Android OS versions 4.4 and above to enjoy LINE to the fullest extent.

**********
If your network speed is too slow or you don't have enough device storage, LINE may not install properly.

If this happens, please check your connection and try again.
**********

description:
* 100,000,000 users across 150 countries.
* Featured by Google Play as Best App & Best Self-Improvement App.

U-Dictionary is a FREE dictionary and translation app. 

U-Dictionary now has official Oxford Dictionaries in 12 languages!

Offline Sentence Translation is also available! Enjoy translating totally offline of 58 languages. 

U-Dictionary takes in originally developed dictionaries, Collins Advanced Dictionary, WordNet Dictionary, Native Examples, Synonyms, Antonyms and so on. It also provides English videos, games and quizzes to help improve your English. 

U-Dictionary is much beyond a simple dictionary! Effortlessly translate texts, pictures, or conversations in 108 languages. It meets all your translation needs, including studying, working and traveling abroad.

FEATURES
Offical Oxford Dictionaries: Check Oxford dictionaries in 12 languages, including 7 Indian languages. Learn from a huge number of authoritative word definitions and sample sentences!
Magic Translation: Translate in WhatsApp,Facebook,Youtube,Instagram to track what‚Äôs happening on celebrities. Chat without borders and read without barriers.

title: KeepClean - Cleaner & Faster
description:
KeepClean is a technology-driven and customized acceleration app; it helps Android phones to solve such problems as cleaning up large junk documents, putting a stop to apps from continually restarting while performing background processes, having your CPU being bogged down, and even overheating. KeepClean is focused on keeping your device functioning as if it were new!

‚ú®HIGHLIGHTS OF KEEPCLEAN:

‚òÖJunk Clean: The app is able to clean the unwanted cache by using big data analysis., one-click cleanup of app and system junk files to completely free up space on device.

‚òÖSpeed up: Smart cleanup provides the ability to free up memory and improve the phones operating speed.

‚òÖBattery Saver: Locates and disables inactive high power consumption apps. Check battery status and activate various power-saving features with a single tap. Prolongs standby duration of up to 70% and optimizes the battery health and usage.

‚òÖCPU Cooler: CPU Cooler provides an in-depth analysis of tens of thousands of Apps to lower CPU consumption, in order to prevent the phone from getting hot, and achieving smoother operation.

‚òÖSecurity: One-click to detect phone loopholes, malicious ads, and apps that maliciously steal private data round the clock.

‚òÖWi-Fi Security: Smart scanning of surrounding Wi-Fi networks to ensure Wi-Fi security in a public environment.

‚òÖSpecial cleanup for Social Apps: In-depth checking of pictures, audios, videos and other documents generated in running social apps, with the ability to remove useless documents and backup valuable documents.

‚òÖApp Management:  Smart management of application status conjoined with batch deletion and backup of Apps.

KeepClean is more reliable! 

‚úîService-oriented: focuses on resolving the compatibility issue of models and versions of Android phones, featuring better localization and compatibility.

‚úîTechnology-driven: forged by a professional technical team, equipped with the stronger capability of low-layer technology.

‚úîLow consumption: stable operation and super-low usage of internal storage.

‚úîSpace-saving: small-size installation package that saves space for the mobile phone.

title: Background Eraser
description:
‚óá This is an application for cutting pictures and for making a picture's background transparent.

‚óá The resulting images can be used as stamps with other apps to make a photomontage, collage.


‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ Features ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ

‚òÜ "Auto" mode ‚òÜ
„ÉªErase similar pixels automatically.

‚òÜ "Extract" mode ‚òÜ
„ÉªSelect and erase objects which you want to remove accurately, by using blue & red markers.

‚òÜ it's very important to make a picture's background transparent accurately
if you want to superimpose photos and make good composite photos.

By using this app, you can do it better.

comments: This app is awesome! I use this to erase any backgrounds I don't want! (Thats the point lol) It's really good for making thumbnails when you're a youtuber (like me). Its not difficult and doesn't pester you with ads! It also doesn't ask you to rate it as much as other apps do! I recommend this app its simple to use! I would surely be using this for a while!

SO GOOD!!! I never had any problems with removing a background. Anyone saying it's hard either doesn't know how to use or lying. Of course it's not like easy easy. There are times where u need to consentrate and need to be precise but it's not that hard. Good for youtubers or people that makes artworks. No more where am I even drawing? Or I'm not a professional person who has been training precision for years. Anyone can do it if u take time and watch tutorials

Soooooo This app is really good! It works perfectly but... It's pretty hard to get rid of you extras left when you use the auto fill. I know there is a option to make it get rid of that but it's not the best. 5 is really bad becuase it can get rid of some of the picture. This app still is good and I still love it for editing. It is great with IBIS paint. Is great! :D

SO GOOD!, its doesn't show as many ads as other apps!!! I suggest using this. and it doesn't SAY TO RATE IT ALL THE TIME ISNT THAT GREAT?. it's so easy to use to! it's so helpful with Youtubers or Instagram fanpages like me! I make themes and this helps so much I suggest using the magic eraser cause it gets all the spots you dont want!!! keep up the hood work byee!!!

Ok, after I use this app for several times, I have found that this app is very helpful in my digital work. To create good photo for my product no matter how bad the background is. Thanks. But sometimes I found it hard to do clear the background to make it as good as it seen .

title: Zombie Hunter Sniper: Last Apocalypse Shooter
description:
Feel the action and survive this apocalypse horror in one of the best free zombie sniper shooting games. Enjoy this survival by being a zombie hunter and killing them in a challenging first person shooter (FPS) with 3D graphics. 
 
Zombies walk among us! You are one of the few survivors of a pandemic infection. The zombie apocalypse began after a scientist dropped a vial of virus in a secret laboratory. Despite military lockdown, in a few hours the zombie infection outbreak reached the outside and now the living dead are rising, hunting humans to feed themselves.
 
As an elite marksman sniper you have experience in shooting range and you were trained in military strategy for chaos, action and survival war games. This could be your last day on Earth so escaping your shelter and turning into a Zombie Hunter is your only hope for survival in this zombie apocalypse. 
 
FPS survival gameplay:
In this FPS game you need to choose the best sniper rifle, load bullets, pull the trigger to open fire and hunt down all the zombies in your way. Defend helpless victims in this zombies apocalypse by shooting undeads before they transform too!
 
Stock up your sniper armory and be the best zombie hunter, choose and upgrade weapons from sniper rifles to crossbows, bazookas, shotguns, assault rifles, revolvers or machine guns. Play with your favorite weapons in this FPS zombie apocalypse survival game.
 
Hunt and kill all kinds of zombies: weak crawling undead or strong super zombies that will test your sniper skills of observation, dexterity and marksmanship in this apocalypse shooting mission. Search from hidden spots, find zombies and kill the target before it‚Äôs too late!
 
Features:
¬∑ Kill zombies before time ends.
¬∑ Upgrade your sniper rifle. 
¬∑ Shoot loot boxes with power ups.
¬∑ Several missions of apocalypse survival action.
¬∑ Survive in open apocalypse battlegrounds.
¬∑ Different guns and weapons.
¬∑ FPS (1st person shooter) survival game play.
¬∑ Play offline or online.
 
Enjoy a zombie apocalypse classic shooter game. FPS action, horror and survival mixed up in a sniper shooting game that will boost your adrenaline by being a zombie hunter. Survive to this zombie apocalypse. Reload your sniper rifle, practice your hunter skills and start shooting for survival. 

KILL ALL THE ZOMBIES IN YOUR WAY!
 
Scenarios:
Can you be the best Zombie Hunter in this Apocalypse? Improve your sniper / hunter skills in a FPS mode, fight in open places and different levels in this apocalypse survival to find out the horror story from Day Zero to 180.
¬∑ Urban city: Jacksonville
¬∑ Camping: Caravan of the Dead
¬∑ Theme Park: Amusement zombie
¬∑ Coast: Dead Port and Snow: Arctic Z.
 
Survive every time shooting the best sniper rifle and prove your FPS shooter skills. Become a true zombie hunter and kill them all!

Enjoy shooting zombies anywhere! One of the best FPS games. Download free Zombie Hunter game to play different missions in open battlegrounds. Zombie Hunter is an online or offline FPS game, you can even play it safe far from the apocalypse or a fallout in an underground bunker!
 
Let the zombie apocalypse shooting begin!

comments: It's a nice game. But I think it would be perfect if we're able to replay any of our previous missions. Since there are limited things that can be done if some weapons criteria are not met. Replaying past missions will help to make more money. That's the reason I can't rate it 5star.

It is a good game but weapons are way too costly. You had to do the side tasks endlessly in order to purchase the new weapon (that is if you don't purchase the in-game currency via real money). Gameplay and maps and all other things are good.

this game is very good i liked it. the graphics are supper good the weapons are good but some of them are far too expensive and why cant u just keep all the weapons equiped so that if you really need the weapons you can just switch them
ok game. watching excessively long, 30 sec. ads is bad enough. No ad need be longer than 10 seconds. But I draw the line at intrusive ads. Sorry but deleted.
The game is really good, but one problem when comes to a shooting, those zombies are stronger than humans, the zombie takes more bullet to die but a human takes one bullet to die.

title: Google Chrome: Fast & Secure
description:
Google Chrome is a fast, easy to use, and secure web browser. Designed for Android, Chrome brings you personalized news articles, quick links to your favorite sites, downloads, and Google Search and Google Translate built-in. Download now to enjoy the same Chrome web browser experience you love across all your devices.
        
        Browse fast and type less. Choose from personalized search results that instantly appear as you type and quickly browse previously visited web pages. Fill in forms quickly with Autofill.
        
        Incognito Browsing. Use Incognito mode to browse the internet without saving your history. Browse privately across all your devices.
        
        Sync Chrome Across Devices. When you sign into Chrome, your bookmarks, passwords, and settings will be automatically synced across all your devices. You can seamlessly access all your information from your phone, tablet, or laptop.
        
        All your favorite content, one tap away. Chrome is not just fast for Google Search, but designed so you are one tap away from all your favorite content. You can tap on your favorite news sites or social media directly from the new tab page. Chrome also has the ‚ÄúTap to Search‚Äù- feature on most webpages. You can tap on any word or phrase to start a Google search while still in the page you are enjoying.
        
        Protect your phone with Google Safe Browsing. Chrome has Google Safe Browsing built-in. It keeps your phone safe by showing warnings to you when you attempt to navigate to dangerous sites or download dangerous files.
        
        Fast downloads and view web pages and videos offline Chrome has a dedicated download button, so you can easily download videos, pictures, and entire webpages with just one tap. Chrome also has downloads home right inside Chrome, where you can access all the content you downloaded, even when you are offline.
        
        Google Voice Search. Chrome gives you an actual web browser you can talk to. Use your voice to find answers on-the-go without typing and go hands free. You can browse and navigate quicker using your voice anywhere, anytime.
        
        Google Translate built-in: Quickly translate entire web pages. Chrome has Google Translate built in to help you to translate entire web to your own language with one tap.
        
        Use less mobile data and speed up the web. Turn on Lite mode and use up to 60% less data. Chrome can compress text, images, videos, and websites without lowering the quality.
        
        Smart personalized recommendations. Chrome creates an experience that is tailored to your interests.  On the new tab page, you will find articles that Chrome selected based on your previous browsing history.

comments: Why the heck are there so many freaking adds now?!?! I'll be reading an article and one will pop up to block the whole screen. I close that out. One pops in and scrolls me to a different area. Then a video pops up at the top and I can get rid of it until the add is done playing, meanwhile there is an add at the bottom of my screen. I used to only use chrome and now it's ruined.

Used to have this app as my web browser main....and then it got updated. Since the update, pages do not load, it does not inform how many tabs are open, the open tabs do not show when looking through them, and it sticks on one page unless i close it down. Tool this back to the Factory settings and will not be updating from this as it runs much better than the last few updates. Sad to see my main browser fall to least favorite. Edge got you guys replaced.

Its nice app but I can't give it five stars because I can't update the app..... And I am sure it's not my problem.... It's chrome's problem because I can't update it in my father's, mother's and also in my sister's phone..and everyone is also complaining about it, it is happening from many days but you are not clearing the issue... Please check the issue and correct it. Hope you will correct it soon. Thank you

Eversince my last update, this rubbish app has caused numerous problems for me. My phone freezes, I can't connect to WiFi and many times unable to access websites on the internet. I hate this crappy Google and Chrome app on my phone. It has caused me numerous prospective business deals, as i couldn't log in to video meetings. Fix this rubbish!!!üò≠

comments: great game... ads only play when you choose to... but when you reach the maximum skill level your combat level will be stuck as well... but i wonder why is that on the skirmish game there are players with higher combat levels, how could they still upgrade their combat level? and what is the purpose of getting more cash when we can't use it anymore after reaching the max skill level?

This is the best offline free game I have ever played. I would have given it a 5 stars but there are issues with the game. 1. Skill cards need to be fixed where we can continue to upgrade them, they max out at level 16. Without skill card upgrade your combat score does not increase. You have also done away with being able to use cash, you need to create another way we can use cash. Also, more chapters please, I finished the new one in 2 days, now what? You have a great product, you must improve

Gameplay is fun and excellent apart from you cannot go back to a missed target which I find odd and irritating. The reason for 3 star rating and uninstalling the app is the persistent pressure to buy stuff like upgrades. Pay2win is usually associated with multiplayer games, in a single player game it just seems rediculous. Either sell the game for a reasonable price or if you feel the need to sell what should be achieved in the game as part of the game, have a store where players can buy stuff.

Wow I am impressed. Visually it looks great and I feel it handles very well. Most shooting games aren't the easiest to control. But this one works. All you do it aim and shoot, so you do loose freedom to run around but the gameplay and graphics make up for it. It's worth a try for anyone into shooters. Will play it through and leave edited review.

Good game and quite addictive. Initially I thought it is pay to win as it got a bit hard after the first few plays, but after that, smooth sailing. You can finish it easy, fast and fun as F2P, but it's too short! Also, after finishing all missions, I still have to unlock half the characters/guns, but there's no point in that as multiplayer isn't rewarding enough and missions are too short and unengaging the 2nd time. PS: Fix Flammable mission & more content = 5*

comments: I have been using the app for years! And I still think it holds up today! However, there is a worrying trend i've been seeing YouTube do over the last few years. From what ive seen, with each new update, YouTube keeps finding ways to make it's mobile app more and more genaric looking and confusing to navigate though. To the point where the interface looks more like a bootleg instagram than YouTube! It doesn't destroy the app or anything, but I hope this gets less of an issue in the future.

Finally the touch interface has been reverted back to normal. On screen info disappears after a few seconds, or you can tap somewhere there is no controls to make them disappear. This is so much better than the controls staying on screen forever until you press the X in the top right. It took a long time (I have no idea why) This way of using touchscreen devices in a full screen mode like YouTube videos is way easier. You tap to bring up controls, you turn captions on or change the resolution.

Every time this app updates it gets worse. I don't understand how the rating is 4.1 when every review is 2 stars or less. I pay for premium and even when I put on a playlist the screen will go black after a few videos and stop completely. I'm paying! If I want to watch videos all night non stop I should be able to, it's ludicrous. There's no customer support whatsoever. Complete garbage. I'm just going to switch to Rumble or another service. Every once in a while it'll show ads I pay not to see.

This is really annoying. At first, it.was great and really working well except from a little bit log. But now,i can't even open it. Once i open it,it would say to update. So i update it. After that, it say that"There is a problem network connection(400)". Even if i try to restart my device,it will still do the same! This is really annoying. All of my battery just got that i spent that i used to watch,all just work for nothing. Fix it right away! This is just what i do relax! miss the old Youtube

This is by far my favorite app that has ever been created so far! It's great for music, podcasts, funny videos! U name it then it's most likely to be a video on YouTube! The king application for uploading videos! The one downside is there are way too many ads. But your in luck because there's a ad free version, for a small monthly fee, of course! Enjoy!

title: Amazon Prime Video
description:
Watch movies and TV shows recommended for you, including Amazon Originals like The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel, Tom Clancy‚Äôs Jack Ryan, and the kids series Tumble Leaf.

App features:
- Download videos to watch offline ‚Äì anywhere, anytime.
- Follow actors or directors and we‚Äôll notify you when they have new videos on Prime Video. Available in US only.
- Cast from your phone or tablet to the big screen with Chromecast. 
- With X-Ray, view IMDb data about the actors, songs, and trivia related to videos as you watch.
- With Prime Video Channels, Prime members can subscribe to more than 150 premium and specialty channels like HBO, SHOWTIME, STARZ, and Cinemax. Only pay for the channels you want, no cable required, cancel anytime (not available in all countries/regions).
- Buy or rent videos from more than 100,000 titles, including new release movies and current TV shows (not available in all countries/regions).

Enjoy Amazon Prime Video in over 200 countries and territories around the globe!

comments: Overall not a terrible app. has good films and shows on it. One thing that keeps on annoying me is that every time I open the app it reminds me about the profiles feature even tho I have already set up a profile on it. Also what's with the adverts, I am already paying ¬£10 a month I don't want adverts. I get that you are promoting your new shows but put them at the end so when I exit the show give me a recommendation for a new show to watch. I know I can skip the adverts but it's just annoying.

Generally first rate. The apps weak point is with no (or a weak) WiFi signal. Then when you go to play a previously downloaded show, you may get a license error. The license errors come in groups. Connecting to WiFi doesn't fix the problem. Deleting and re-dowloading the show will fix the problem. Sometimes it fixes a group of them.

Almost great. No way to rate content. Unfortunately a lot of content is not available in original language. In Switzerland we have German, French and Italian as major languages so it is hit and miss if a film or show is in a language you speak even if it was originally made in English. Bohemian Rhapsody is only available in Italian, Electric Dreams only in German. Curiously Buffy the vampire slayer is only available in English. Netflix has original plus German, French and often Italian.

The good things about prime video is it is a good deal for a lot of perks. The prime video library is really good too. Now the bad things The app is buggy at times. Sometimes when I close the player it returns to episode menu but is stuck there unless I go back to homepage The video player opens in seperate window and when I'm switching applications I can't tell which prime video window to select in recent apps window. The windows app is even worse, downloads expire as soon as I download them.

It's an app deserving of 5 star rating all right. But this is an updated review because I am unable to stream in full HD on my LG G8x. I've checked the phone just to be sure and it supports Widevine L1 plus all other streaming services like Netflix are able to play HD content on my phone except this app. Please fix this. It's a frustrating experience and no one is even responding to my emails or feedback

comments: This app is great. One thing though. I just wish the consistency with the refacing was better. I feel it depends on the picture taken and used. Doesn't compketely replace the actosr face to resemble your face. Some of the clips seem like they do not change a bit. Is there a way to better the consistency of the refacing? If so, then I would give the app a 5 star rating. Thank you

I got the pro initially. After using it often I was told the unlimited was available. I was charged for both. Upset I emailed your customer service : Hello. As far as I understand, you're using an Android phone. You should try reinstalling the app, this usually helps On Sun, Oct 25, 2020 at 3:11 PM adavsamuel wrote: I signed up for the pro, but if I upgrade to unlimited will I be charged for both in a year. How can I just have the unlimited? Please advise, Ada

At first the app is fine and its fun to use. I didnt mind the fact I had to wait seven minutes to use it again but the second time I have to wait half an hour? The moment you open the app it already asks you to pay to use it which is annoying. I have no issues with how the app runs, but its how they try to make you pay for using it that annoys me.

I really love this app I'm having so much fun! My only problem is accessing my gallery. The lag time is RIDICULOUS I can only see about 20 pics and the rest are just black. Any suggestions? UPDATE: 10/30 After messaging a few times and Uninstalling and reinstalling the app I am really enjoying it. The longer videos are great!

Fun app but minus 1 star for two reasons... 1. Kept me up all night. Had I paid for the full version, I could have been sleeping most of the night but I had to support the app by watching 30 second ads before each reface. 2. I get the ads but maybe not before each reface, maybe every other one. At least change the ads up a little. Most of the time you're watching the same ad like that's going to make me buy the product. Anyway, it's a fun app. If you really like it, pay for it.

comments: I love this video player compared to the default one on phones. Runs well, and the play opinions are great. Live Stream doesn't work well, but luckily I don't really use that. EDIT- After a while of using this player, I just bought Premium because I love this app that much. And I mean you don't really need premium to use this app, so people, please try this app. It'll be worth it.

Please add "opaque box" for subtitle. Add the "select subtitle" next to the night mode on the screen. double tap skip is very useful. create "second to seek for jump action", "10 second" for skip is very limited. Change the brightness and volume numbers of 1-10 to 1-100. Add the video name to display in playback section. Thanks.
I have issue with SW decoder, it's annoying because I can't watch movies as good as possible. This problem started like 7 days ago, please fix it.
I'm premium member (paid) Last few version, the "remember brightness" doesn't work. I reported few times to the developer, and I didn't get any response. Beware, No after service.
It's extremely annoying when you are in background play mode(audio mode), and go back to the video, and it starts from the beginning all over again

title: Unison League
description:
GAME FEATURES
‚ñºReal Time Co-Op Quests
Steamroll any ugly monsters or other players that get in your way with up to 4 friends at a time!
‚ñºFully Customizable Appearance
Dress to impress and create a unique combination of face, hair, and gear to make your mark on the world! None will forget the heroic deeds of Bananaface.

‚ñºIntense Guild Battles
Epic guild battles allow for teams of up to 10 players to duke it out in real time! Strategize and dominate!
‚ñºStunning Unison Attacks
Coordinate with your guildies to unleash eye-popping Unison Attacks that will have your enemies crying in fear!
‚ñºAnd Much More!
- Customizable room that your friends can check out and visit!
- Collect and upgrade gear!
- Learn new abilities to unleash in battle!
- And more!

[Price] Free to play (in-app purchases available)
[Supported Devices] Devices that come standard with Android(TM) 4.0 or later (excluding some devices)
*We are unable to support and compensate for use on devices outside of the supported range.
*A Wi-Fi connection is recommended for the optimal Unison League experience.
*Before playing Unison League please read the End User License Agreement, which can be accessed from the in-game menu.

recentChanges: Includes additional bug fixes
comments: It's a good game, but only if you want to spam cards, been on this game for a couple years now. I've come and gone and they still have things that make it near impossible for non pay to win players to progress. If you want to progress you need to get powerful gear, a good way to do that is events. An event that requires a 300k gear score will one shot people with a 1m gear score. If your not looking to progress and just want to chill with random people, it's a good game to be on.

The fact that I've been playing this game for ever since like four years ago and they still haven't fixed the neverending "Now Loading" screen is just... honestly, disappointing. You're forced to exit the game every two or three quests you do and the devs haven't done anything to change that. I came back for the sake of nostalgia but it's let me down once again. Annoying.

The general overall experience of the game is good. Recent updates have however caused regular issues in game such as freezing and dodgy connections (which yes u have tested and aren't just my signal). The company clearly puts a lot of thought into new things to add to the game, I just feel they need to address bugs more because since the last lot were added, it's been months with no change, yet loads of new content for them to make money. Clearly their priority is money and nothing else

Honestly, I fell in love with the game a few years back. I still enjoy it to a certain degree, but some things have been bugging me: 1. There are some minor glitches like people or monsters not loading. While it seems innocent, it becomes really inconvinient for Guild Battles and stuff. 2. Even though the devs tried to solve the issue, it's still an issue. The stronger the monsters, the more broken it is. Unisoning in Guild Battles is still broken as such. Please continue to resolve the issue!

The game is pretty nice. The customization feels great and streamlined; easy to learn. One critique is that with more money, you can easily progress faster than everyone around you, akin to the problem Clash of Clans has. The gameplay feels nice and natural; along with the fun guild battle system. If I could change one thing about the game, it would be to customize the party you quest with. I.E. Choosing whether or not to allow other CPU's to come with you. Overall, great game, fun time.

title: Pinterest
description:
Looking for creative ideas? Whether you‚Äôre planning your next big travel adventure, searching for home design concepts, looking for fashion & fitness tips or checking out new recipes, explore lifestyle inspiration on Pinterest. Good ideas start here!

Discover billions of possibilities for every part of your life, from new recipes to creative home design ideas. Create extra home storage space, find your new favorite recipe, or get tattoo inspiration on Pinterest.

Save ideas on Pinterest:
‚òÖ Find lifestyle inspiration & explore articles on trending and recommended topics 

‚òÖ Collaborate with friends for your next group trip, party or DIY project 

‚òÖ See ideas & images out in the world that you like and snap a photo with Pinterest Lens to find out how to buy/make/do them!

Discover wedding tips, beauty inspiration and design concepts for your big day. Explore thousands of recommended or trending images, get travel inspiration or read new recipes and creative food ideas for your next dinner party. With fitness tips, interesting DIY projects to try out and tons of great fashion, style & beauty tips, Pinterest keeps all of your lifestyle inspiration in one place.

You never know what sparks a great design idea or when inspiration for your next DIY project might strike.

Get inspired from anywhere on the internet. Save your ideas, organize them by topic and share with others ‚Äì all from your pocket! 

Get ideas for the topics you care about most:
- Home design, architecture & DIY
- Creative wedding tips 
- Travel, fitness & beauty
- Fashion and style inspiration
- Food, new recipes & cooking 

To start saving and sharing Pins, download now.

recentChanges: Every week we polish up the Pinterest app to make it faster and better than ever. Tell us if you like this newest version at http://help.pinterest.com/contact
comments: I really love Pinterest, it's a great source of dopamine for my ADHD brain. But more and more frequently I'm having trouble saving Pins. They take FOREVER to load (sometimes they don't load at all) and if the Pin isn't fully loaded it won't let me save it to my boards. Also, why can't I search for other people's boards anymore?? Please bring that feature back!

I love this app. It is exceptionally handy, simple to use and much more. It has most of the topics ranging from celebrities, Do It Yourself (D.I.Y) , and many many more. It also helps me to pin the photos, create new boards, looking for new ideas and many more. Thanks for your kindness, helpfulness and keep it interesting. So, keep on improving. I will be looking forward to see many more topics. As I always replying politely, stay home, stay safe and have a great time.

This app has been great in so many ways and I love it. But lately the app keeps crashing. It doesn't stay open for more than 2 seconds and as someone else mentioned, it does stay open in the background. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling. I switched my cell off and on again. Cleared cache and even did a deep scan of my phone. But nothing seems to be working. Hope the issue gets resolved quickly.

This app was pretty good. I've been using it for 2 years. But lately the app has been crashing very much. It does stays open for more than 2-3 second. Also when i am using any other apps then suddenly a thing pops out saying "Unfortunately, pinterest has stopped" . I have seen that others are also facing this same problem. If you can then please repair it asap.

Idk what the hell is going on, but it will go from allowing you to scroll to not allowing anything but moving up and down the pin. You have to back out of the pin you're on, which is possibly really are far down or closer to where the LAST time it stopped letting you scroll, and have to go all the way to the pin you were on. THEN it'll stop scrolling like three pins. Or five. And it needs to be fixed before I change my review. Even updating it didn't fix the issue, if anything it got worse.
